refnamediv.refpurpose: Naming rules for variables and functions

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Names of variables and functions must begin with a letter or one of the following special characters: % _ # ! ? $.
Next characters may be letters, digits, or any special character among _ # ! $ ?.
Upper and lower case letters are different.
Names may be as long as you want.

refsection.title: Examples

itemizedlist.listitem: Scilab's parser no longer truncates names longer than 24 characters.
UTF-8 characters are now accepted in names of variables and fields.
